adrFormatAddress: 737 9th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I brought a group of friends here to enjoy some good food and vibes, and like always, they did not disappoint. The new Tom Yum sauce is a great addition to their selection of seafood sauces. The new appetizer platter and Thai wings were perfect for sharing and to get the table going while waiting for the main course. Music, drinks, and service are top notch! Niko, the manager made sure we have a good time. Thank you for always rolling out the red carpet whenever I come by. Arguably one of the best Shaking Crab branches!

originalText.text: Literally loveeee this place. Every time we go they give us some complimentary fries, the staff is super friendly and attentive. This time we ordered one of their specialty trays “The Maine Course” that includes two HUGE lobsters, HUGE mussels, clams, potatoes and corn + we ordered half a pound of shrimp with it. The portions are soooo big for the price, the tray before the added shrimp was only $105, it was only two of us on this tray and I was so full it can definitely feed UP TO 4 people. Their cocktails are also really good and STRONG .Definitely recommend !

originalText.text: This place was super good!! We (2 of us) got the tray for 1 person and just did add one. It was plenty. Everything was cooked wonderfully. The garlic butter sauce was so so good. VERY VERY garlicky! Server was super cool and attentive.

text.text: This place was super good!! We (2 of us) got the tray for 1 person and just did add one. It was plenty. Everything was cooked wonderfully. The garlic butter sauce was so so good. VERY VERY garlicky! Server was super cool and attentive.

originalText.text:
Dined here on a very cold Friday night with a party of 6. The restaurant was very cozy and warm and had a fun vibe. The servers and the host were excellent—very friendly and attentive. They took their time explaining the menu to us and even gave us samples of the different spices so we can make a decision. To top it off, they gave us two rounds of fries as an appetizer for free. Customer service here is superb.
The only thing I can say is that the portion size of the bag was a little smaller than I’m used to for the price but everything was tasty. We all left full and satisfied.

originalText.text:
My group of 7 people went to Shaking crab for dinner on 12/23/23 for a friends birthday and contradictory to a negative review (about the same day) we had an amazing experience!!

Our group got all different things but every single person LOVED their meal! Snow crab boil, fisherman’s platter, fish sandwich, fried pickles, garlic noodles, fried lobster tail- all things we got and absolutely enjoyed. This by no means is a healthy meal as most items are deep fried or contain lots of butter/sodium (boils), however, we went for some delicious soul food & they did not disappoint! The portions are generous (nobody left hungry) and the prices are fair.

The staff was extremely attentive and respectful. Staff was very kind in accommodating 4 separate checks. Contradictory to the negative review about the same day; we didn’t see anybody that appeared sick or coughing. Some staff members were wearing masks but that is fine with us. The restaurant was clean and the food super yummy, so yummy that i didn’t even get a pic of the food (we all dug right in!) but here’s a pic of my leftovers that I got to enjoy once home. Only complaint is that the lock to the men’s restroom could possibly be fixed so that it’s easily able to lock.

Overall a great experience, highly recommend for delicious soul food with fair prices, attentive staff and a full, satisfied belly!
